topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c408d86368725d81d80e00#post_54c408d86368725d81d80e00
I will have a Shining Armor.
Although it's kind of funny, Whenever I buy pony related items for myself I always get the usual question "So is this for your niece/daughter/sister". I always say no and they get the cashiers most hilarious look on their fafe.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c4096463687275b2ca0300#post_54c4096463687275b2ca0300
Well When I go to get pony things I'm usually with my mom.

At first I was shy and always lied and said I'm getting it for someone but I stared to not care anymore and just say its for me! 

(Something funny is that its always a girl who's stuffing the plushies)

Also, today at the mall I saw it, I saw someone wearing one of those _*open chest sweaters*_.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c40aee6368726a97e71700#post_54c40aee6368726a97e71700
Of course a girl so don't get your hopes up. (A pudgy lady at fact, she looked really nice in it too!)

But still I would have never thought I see someone actually wearing one of those!
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c407c06368721409b90500#post_54c407c06368721409b90500
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c4059e636872035e410b00#post_54c4059e636872035e410b00
Nice!

I just got back from the mall!

My Mane 6 Build a Bear collection is complete! Just got Applejack! [/bq]
If only the BABW in my area didn't close down... I would've gotten Luna for my brother and Celestia for myself.

I'm lucky to even have found out about this one cuz like I said the one that was SUPER near me shut down too.

I have to drive out of town to get to this one!

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c40d9f63687276b3bd0a00#post_54c40d9f63687276b3bd0a00
The one in my mall apparently from one of the ladies that works in this Build a bear told us it closed down because they decided to Re locate it in the mall, but the location they put it in got no costumers. 

It was RIGHT next to the playground in the mall and it got so much costumers and they moved it to a place wear it got no business! That was really dumb of them to do.
